attributes.action: persuade the BBC to withdraw from the Eurovision Song contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the BBC are wasting vast sums of licence payers money to support this annual farce. The songs are now secondary in a show that has become a soap box for Eastern European countries.It is well past its sell by date and the licence payer deserve better.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
